forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 23C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds this morning will give way to generally sunny skies for the afternoon. High 74F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 53F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 71F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.
